entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as doodling on his parchment and ignoring Hermione's glares.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A classmate of Harry's who is trying to get his attention. She points out the window to a letter tied to Hedwig's leg.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl who has delivered a letter to him. She is described as perched on the narrow window ledge, gazing through the thick glass at Harry.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: A classmate of Harry's who comments on how beautiful Hedwig is.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Lavender's friend who also comments on how beautiful Hedwig is.

entities.name: professor binns
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who continues to read his notes while the class's attention is focused on the letter delivered by Hedwig.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, as evidenced by the fact that she delivers letters to him.
Hermione tries to get Harry's attention by pointing out the letter tied to Hedwig's leg.
